MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY12 postcode area of Dunfermline, affecting properties in Carneil Terrace and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12:20pm due to a fault on the underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 12:44pm on Wednesday, 17 February 2021.
